Title: Requires the establishment of a renewable hydrogen incentive program
Summary: Requires the establishment of a renewable hydrogen incentive program to support the production, processing, delivery, storage, or end use of hydrogen in New York for the purpose of meeting the greenhouse gas emissions goals of the climate leadership and community protection act (CLCPA).
LawCode: Add ยง74-c, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the establishment of a renewable hydrogen incentive program
